author: gdamour
msg: Adds support for automatic primary key generation. This mechanism can be used:
- either to define the identity of EJB defining an unknown primary key; or
- to define automatically the primary key of an EJB.
Updates the various CMPFinder implementations in order to load in the InTxCache the found entities.

author: gdamour
msg: Provides some GBeans wrapping the PrimaryKeyGenerator implementations defined by TranQL.

author: adc
msg: An even better version of Jetty.

author: dain
msg: Now we have sql mapping we can reduce the number of extra tables
